column1: .@HouseDemocrats failed to prove any wrongdoing — now the Senate will fully acquit @realDonaldTrump.  No matter what the biased managers say the facts remain:  – No quid pro quo – Ukraine felt no pressure – Unaware of funds withheld  – No impeachable offense  Case Closed.

-Glee -Laughter -Pictures -Souvenir pens  -A Ceremony  This is how “serious sad and somber” Democrats are when sending the articles of impeachment to the Senate.  Pelosi’s 'engrossment ceremony' proves that she cares more about politics than truth.  @POTUS will be acquitted. https://t.co/s7OwO95WCp

.@RepJerryNadler claims impeachment was so urgent because they had "to stop the president from rigging the next election."  Does he even hear himself?  Pelosi has been sitting on Democrats' impeachment articles for 28 days...  It's impossible to take these Democrats seriously.

Democrat presidential candidates had another debate last night — as usual it was boring and negative.  They refuse to acknowledge the economy is booming under @POTUS and seem to hope for our downfall.   They offer socialist solutions as the only path forward — sad path indeed!

Pelosi & her disgraceful Dems reveal that they will not stop until @realDonaldTrump is removed from office.   They seek to disenfranchise some 60 million Americans simply because they don't like @POTUS.  — Booming economy  — stronger national security  What do they not like?

What was the biggest accomplishment for Democrats in 2019?  Absolutely nothing — except bore the American people with faux impeachment fantasies and massively boost the President’s ratings and fundraising!   Americans saw their partisan witch hunt for what it truly was.

So the mainstream media is not only the mouthpiece for Leftist talking points they are now giving advice on political strategy.  Democrats and Fake News outlets — dumb and dumber! https://t.co/0t09psY04b

Not to imply that America is necessarily greater than any other country nor the only America in the Western Hemisphere. Also this wish is made without regard to the race creed color age physical ability religious faith or sexual preference of the wish.

I also wish you a fiscally successful and personally fulfilling recognition of the onset of the generally accepted calendar year 2020 but not without due respect for the calendars of choice of other cultures whose contributions to society have helped make America great.

..practiced within the most enjoyable traditions of the religious persuasion of your choice or secular practices of your choice with respect for the religious/secular persuasion and/or traditions of others or their choice not to practice religious or secular traditions at all.
